demoScreen.title: What’s In This Stack?
demoScreen.tagLine: Congratulations, you’ve got a very advanced React Native app template here.  Take advantage of this boilerplate!
demoScreen.androidReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running, run adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 from your terminal, and reload the app.
demoScreen.iosReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
demoScreen.macosReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
demoScreen.webReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
demoScreen.windowsReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.

errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.json`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/error`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.

ho-space.leaseWarning: If you have a lease agreement. Please check your agreement on whether you're allowed to share your spare room. Your landlord might make an exception if you explain the situation.

intro.option-1-text: By sharing what spare space you have, you can help us give a refugee a safe place.
intro.option-2-text: We publish your space to our hand-approved partners without your personal details. Your details are yours.
intro.option-3-text: Once a partner finds you, they can show their interest to connect with you.
intro.option-4-text: After receiving a connection request, you can decide to share your details. Only then will our partner see them.
intro.get-started: Awesome, let’s get you set up!
intro.homeowner: I have spare room to share
intro.partner: I'm a non-profit, governmental agency or other partner

ho-setup.title: Register on Samaritan
ho-setup.1-text: These details let us connect with you.
ho-setup.2-text: Tell us about where you are located.
ho-setup.3-text: Tell us a little bit about your place.

pa-setup.title: Register on Samaritan
pa-setup.1-text: These details let us connect with you.
pa-setup.2-text: Tell us about where you are located.
pa-setup.3-text: Tell us why we should approve you.
